en.start: Hello! I'm your diet/exercise assistant bot. Link your account with /link <username> <password>. Use /setlang to change language.
en.link_fail: Link failed. Make sure your credentials are correct.
en.not_linked: You are not linked to an account. Use /link <username> <password>.
